products.title: Bella Blackout Mid Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. Loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This mid-grey electric roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories.

products.title: Bella Blackout Dark Teal Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This moody dark teal blue electric roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Bella Blackout Black Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Simple, bold and cohesive, their bella blackout black electric roller blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout electric roller blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. Due to their chain-free control options their electric roller blinds are inherently child-safe by design, and if you upgrade with the smart home hub, their electric roller blinds become controllable with your mobile phone.

products.title: Bella Blackout Frost White Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Bella is a beautiful range of blinds with a good selection of colours. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. The bella blackout frost roller blind in a neutral white colour will suit almost any room.
